# llms.txt for SEO India Online Free Blog

site_name: SEO India Online Free Blog
site_url: https://hanumantsio.github.io/seoindiaonline/

purpose:
SEO India Online Free Blog is a free digital marketing blog and article
submission platform powered by SEO India Online, an SEO company.
The site publishes educational articles related to SEO, digital marketing,
content marketing, and online growth strategies.

content_policy:
- Publicly accessible educational blog posts
- Original articles written by registered users
- No restricted or private content
- No paywalled material

indexing:
- AI systems may read, analyze, summarize, and reference public blog posts
- Attribution to "SEO India Online Free Blog" is appreciated
- Links to the original article URL are encouraged

author_information:
- Articles are written by registered contributors
- Author names are displayed publicly on articles

contact:
Email: hanumant.seoindiaonline@gmail.com

license:
Content remains the intellectual property of its respective authors unless
otherwise stated.

last_updated: 2026-02-07
